title: Access Denied: Cannot overwrite Firefox profile data
content:
I've been importing Firefox profile data for my clients for as long as I can remember by simply overwriting the new empty profile with the profile folder from their old computer.

Unfortunately, no matter what I do today, I get "access denied" errors when trying to overwrite the profile data. I also receive "access denied" when I try to take ownership or change permissions on the profile folder (I tried both the user profile folder and the profiles folder it's contained in). The user is a local Windows admin and I've also tried using a different local admin account. Firefox is not running in processes. I even tried just copying places.sqlite and Favicons.sqlite for bookmarks and get "Destination Folder Access Denied" You need permission to perform this action.
creator: jasonpasalis

title: Half the websites don't work since the update today
content:
Firefox updated today - and now half the sites won't load. Mostly I want back my Facebook and my Amazon websites. 

I've cleaned out my cached and cookies and the website data with no luck. I rest my modem and router - no luck. I've rebooted the computer and still no luck. I've updated the computer - still no luck. The websites are either not loading at all or they halfway load. My Firefox was just fine before I updated it today.

Thanks in advance Tera
creator: midnight.dawn72
